batchFermentables.name: Pilsen Malt
batchFermentables.notes: BEST Pilsen Malt gives beer a fresh and rounded taste. It is used for all types of beers based on basically berley malt. It forms an excellent “light” and enzyme-rich foundation for almost all beer styles.  Malt characteristics: low protein levels, high extract content, light color and high enzymatic activity. BEST Pilsen Malt is also available in organic quality.

batchFermentables.name: Wheat Malt
batchFermentables.notes: BEST Wheat Malt emphasises the effervescent freshness and the typical top-fermented flavor of wheat beer. It is produced from high quality brewing wheat. Malting processes adapted to the raw material highlight the particular qualities of this malt.

yeasts.name: SafBrew Ale
yeasts.description: General purpose ale yeast with neutral flavor profiles. Its low attenuation gives beers with a very good length on the palate. Particularly recommended for specialty ales and trappist type beers. Yeast with a medium sedimentation: forms no clumps but a powdery haze when resuspended in the beer.

notes.note: Start sparging with 1.7 L water @ 72 C
